title: "Locus Robotics collects $50 million in new funding for AMRs"
excerpt: "Warehouse automation provider Locus Robotics today gained new fuel to develop its autonomous mobile robot (AMR) technology for fulfillment tasks, thanks to a $50 million funding round. Massachusetts-based Locus Robotics said the new backing would facilitate continued growth and expansion into new markets around the globe,"
